name: Emotional Journey Map - Mentor UX
description:
As a mentor for UX bootcamp students I though I made a map to help them go through the process and reflect.


Besides the emotional journey map this template includes:

  • Introduction
  • Concerns / Motivations
  • Roadmap
  • SMART goal
  • Design Thinking process
  • ExS. IxD, UR & IA Quadrant


Let me know if you have any questions or feedback.
